attributes.action: a petition to cancel 2021 exams due to the new variant of the virus.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to cancel exams.
attributes.background: the government should take into consideration the disruption in education children will and have faced due to the new variant and consider cancelling exams. due to the disruption in studying and not being able to study in the future

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
